effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
